summary: Buppah Rahtree is a loner female student at a Bangkok university who becomes the object of a wager by a group of male students to see if she can be bedded. Ake, the son of a wealthy family,... See full synopsis »
cast: Laila Boonyasak|Krit Sripoomseth|Chompunoot Piyapane|Sirisin Siripornsmathikul|Ampon Rattanawong|Somjai Sukjai|Sayan Meungjarern|Mr. Nicolas|Somlek Sakdikul|Siriporn Samatikul

title: Buppha Rahtree
